description:
when i excute the command:penstack server create --flavor m1.nano --image cirros   --nic net-id=xxxxxxx --security-group default   --key-name mykey provider-instance
a error occured as the following:
Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<type 'exceptions.TypeError'> (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-7f5ecbf3-61e3-436b-b064-c003b70df4c7)
title: Unexpected nova API Error in launching a intance

comments.content:
when i excute the command:penstack server create --flavor m1.nano --image cirros   --nic net-id=xxxxxxx --security-group default   --key-name mykey provider-instance
a error occured as the following:
Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<type 'exceptions.TypeError'> (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-7f5ecbf3-61e3-436b-b064-c003b70df4c7)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~abcdyoyoo

comments.content:
Got this error in nova-api.log:
2016-11-10 15:11:51.413 18410 ERROR nova.api.openstack.extensions     for api_server in CONF.glance.api_servers:
2016-11-10 15:11:51.413 18410 ERROR nova.api.openstack.extensions TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not iterable
2016-11-10 15:11:51.413 18410 ERROR nova.api.openstack.extensions 

Please comment the [glance]api_servers in nova.conf.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~eric-xie

comments.content:
ok,thanks for your comments.
my nova.conf is in the attachment as you can see.
maybe some wrong are happened,please tell me and i will be very appreciated.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~abcdyoyoo

comments.content: Hi kubert, is the conf file on compute node?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~eric-xie

comments.content:
Oh no,i'm confused.This is nova.conf in controller node.
The nova.conf of compute node is here.
But i repeated every configure file, all of it are by the order of http://docs.openstack.org/newton/install-guide-rdo.I still have no idea about this error.

If you can give me a direction, i will be very appreciated.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~abcdyoyoo

comments.content: Sorry, i can not found why this issue happened.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~eric-xie

comments.content:
looks like it complain CONF.glance.api_servers is None , your controller seems 
api_servers = http://controller:9292
have you changed this and didn't restart the service?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jichenjc

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor
